import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiGift, FiCreditCard, FiShield, FiHeart, FiCheckCircle } from 'react-icons/fi'; const DonatePage = () => { const [donationAmount, setDonationAmount] = useState(''); const [customAmount, setCustomAmount] = useState(''); const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false); const presetAmounts = [100, 250, 500, 1000, 2500, 5000]; const handleDonation = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsProcessing(true); // Simulate donation processing setTimeout(() => { setIsProcessing(false); alert('Thank you for your donation! This is a demo - in a real implementation, this would integrate with a payment gateway.'); }, 2000); }; return (

{/* Donor Information */}
